Ellipsis · Get work done in chat

Ellipsis documentation.

View the Project on GitHub

Testing actions

The skill editor has a built-in testing tool that can help you test the components of an action:

  • You can test what text will trigger the action, and what (if any) input is collected from the trigger
  • You can test running the action, which will run the function (if any) using input values of your choice, and see what the response is.

Click the Test… button while any action is selected in the skill editor to begin testing.

Test the triggers

Type a message to see which trigger it matches, if any. If your trigger collects input using the fill-in-the-blank method or capturing parentheses, the tool will fill in what input was collected.

Test the response

Click Test response to run the action. You can edit what input the action uses. Once the action is complete, the test tool will show you the response or any error that may have occurred.

This project is maintained by ellipsis-ai
